14098.「芸で得られる よろこびなんか まやかしだぜ。\n 覚えとけ。芸は なんの役にも:
The pleasure you get from tricks is nothing
but an illusion. Remember that. Tricks are
useless for anything.

14099.「……へへ 誰かと思ったら <cs_pchero>か。\n 会いたかったぜ とー:
...Heheh, look who it is. <cs_pchero>.
I've missed you, oh so very much.

14100.「ポルファンの元で 修行してるってことは\n お前も ご立派な教えに共感してんだ:
I'm assuming that by training under Polfan,
you also share his beliefs?

14101.「芸は 人を救えるって アレだよ。:
You know, about tricks being able to save
people.

14102.「……ハンッ クソが！ イライラさせやがる！\n どいつもこいつも甘ちゃんで ヘ:
...What garbage! It drives me mad! They're all
so naive, it makes me want to puke!

14103.「オレは 芸の無力さに絶望し\n 闇芸人ルルルリーチ様に 尽くすと決めたのだ！:
I despaired at the powerlessness of my tricks,
and chose to devote myself to Master Relulu.

14104.「いくぞ 弟弟子 <cs_pchero>よ！\n 本当に芸で人を救えるのなら\n:
Let's go, <cs_pchero>! If you can really
save people with your tricks, then prove it to
me here and now!

14105.「……ククク。なかなか やるな。\n だが それでは オレは止められんぞ。:
...Kukuku. You're good. But that won't be
enough to stop me.

14106.悪魔道化師ゲイザーの身体のキズが\n見る見るうちに ふさがっていく。:
The wounds on Demon Clown Gazer's body are
rapidly closing up.

14107.「オレは 旅芸人を抹殺するため\n 何度 ケガを負っても 復活する身体を\n ル:
I was given a body by Master Relulu that can
recover no matter how many times it's injured,
all for the sake of killing minstrels.

14108.「弟弟子よ。お前の芸が いつわりでないのなら\n 芸で人を救えるというのなら ポ:
My brethren. If your tricks are not a sham,
if you can save people with them, then do as
Polfan says and settle this with a Pratfall!

14109.「……芸で 人なんか救えねえ。 \n それがわかるまで 何百回でも 何千回でも\:
...You can't save people with tricks. I will
crush you a hundred, no, a THOUSAND times over
until you understand that!

14111.「ポルファンの言葉が いつわりでないのなら\n このオレを 止めてみせろ！:
If Polfan's words are not a lie, then just try
to stop me!

14112.「……やるじゃねえか。弟弟子よ。\n お前の芸 確かに見せてもらったぜ。:
...You're good, my brethren. I have gotten a
good look at your tricks.

14114.「ひさしぶりに 人間のころの笑いを思いだした。\n ははっ なかなか 面白かった:
I remembered laughing as a human for the first
time in forever. Haha, that was actually
pretty funny...

14115.「あ～あ せっかく キミの中にあった\n 芸を憎む心を 利用してあげたのに。\n:
Aww, we took advantage of your hatred for
tricks you had inside of you, but you lost
so easily.

14116.「ルルルリーチ様は 人間のわりに\n 邪悪なオーラを持っていた キミを気に入って:
Master Relulu turned you into a monster
because he took an interest in the evil aura
around you, despite being a human.

14117.「もう 用済みだねぇ。\n だいぶ 旅芸人を殺してくれたみたいだし\n そろそろ:
You've done your job. You've killed more than
enough minstrels, so now it's time for you to
die, too.

14118.「そ～れ！ 燃えちゃえ～♪\n ３連続 メラゾーマ～♪:
There you go! Time to burn～♪
Three Kafrizzes in a row～♪

14121.「うっひょ～ これは死んだね～♪\n 見てるだけで熱そう♪ 痛そう♪:
Woohoo～ He's dead～♪ Just looking will
get you burnt ♪ Looks like it hurt ♪

14124.「み みせてくれ。\n さい…ごに お前…の芸を…。:
Let me see. One last... time... your...
trick...

14127.「はは…は。やはり 面白いな……。: Haha... ha. It really is... funny...

14128.「はは……。そう…いえば\n 母の…死に顔は おだやか…だった。:
Haha... Now... that I think about it... my
mother's face looked peaceful when she died.

14129.「……きっと 母…も\n 師匠の芸を見て……こんな風に\n 安心して…旅立ったん:
I'm sure that my mother... seeing master's
tricks... must have felt at ease like this...
before she passed...

14130.「……ははっ まい…ったな。\n これが 芸は…人を救うということか。:
...Haha, looks like... I lost. So this is
how... tricks can save people...

14131.「師匠……。オレが まち…がってたよ。\n あな…たは 確かに 芸で…人を……\:
Master... I was wrong... You... have indeed...
saved someone... with your... tricks...
